```{r}
n = 200
y_mean = 2172
mu0 = 1875
sigma0 = 160
sigma1= 200

mun = ((1/sigma0^2)*mu0+(n/sigma1^2)*y_mean)/(1/sigma0^2 +n/sigma1^2)
sigman = 1/(1/sigma0^2 + n/sigma1^2)
mun
sqrt(sigman)
1/sigman
mun-1.96*sqrt(sigman)
mun+1.96*sqrt(sigman)
```

```{r}
theta = seq(0, 100, 0.1)
plot(theta, 1/theta^2, type="l")

```
